item.title: Expansion and Alaska NTTF Cargo Add On v2.0 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | January 16, 2025

Expansion and Alaska NTTF Cargo Add On v2.0 ATS

ATS Expansion & Alaska NTTF Cargo Addon for Modded Trailers

Included Modded Trailers
Pizzster Modding – Rogers, Murray – UPDATED 10th Sept, Timesko, Wade, Barrett, Timpte Super Hopper, Wilson Commander, Manac Logger
850 Modding – Versamaxx – UPDATED 2nd Oct, Heavy Logging Trailer, 65T Scissorneck, 60T Highboy
KisadoWalker – Steerable Dolly, Aussie Byrne Livestock, Tanker, Kalya Siebert
D&F Modding – Gincor
Zeemods – Frameless End Dump
HFG’s – Manac Flat Deck, East Dump
Dro Modding – MAC MFG Dump, Kalyn Stepdeck, Temisko Logger, Deloupe Lowboy, Wilkins Walking Floor
Mark Browser – Nascar Featherlite (only 2 locations for now)
Skorri Industries – Nascar Featherlite (only 2 locations for now)
F3D Modding – Car Hauler (only 2 locations for now), Kalyn Siebert Oilfield Trailer
H3D Arts – Pratt Coil Trailer (2/3 locations)
Heavy Haulin Customz – CX11 Car Hauler, 388 Wrecker and International Rollback (only 2 locations for now)
B4RT’s – Wilson Silverstar Livestock, (SWC) Eby Horse Trailer
CT Modding – Merritt Livestock
MTG’s Trailer pack from the 281-351
Lund Mods – 1960’s Peerless Trailer
Caleel – 2023 Mac 53ft Flatbed
Sartana – B-Double
Jon Ruda – Lowboy, Flatbed, Polar Tanker
Ironwerx – Lowboy
Selonik Company Models – Felling FT-50-3LP
Stoned Customz – Wilson Livestock Trailer
Stoned Customz & Heavy Haulin Customz * – MAXX (Flight of the Navigator SCS Lowboy Addon Cargo) -Removed due to some errors that need correcting
Fishpant’s Modding – Walker Food Grade Tanker (1 location atm due to unique cargo until sites are made), Dragon Tanker

Recenyly Added **
Durahaul Water Tanker
Smith & Co Sidedump
Wilson Old Livestock
Dorsey Chip Van
Transcraft Eagle Flatbed
Tytal Crude Oil Tanker
Mate Tri-Axle End Dump
Jetco Grain Hopper

SCS Trailers

Credits: Trucker Papi Pupz

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
